title: Siberia: The Land and its people
brief_description: Introduces Siberia and indicates the huge area it embraces. Traces the history of its growth and gives examples of the great variety of its inhabitants. Also shows the remnants of pre-revolution religion. Fom the series “Siberia: The Endless horizon”.
